DOC.brief_summary: In this study we will assess as a primary objective the effect of venlafaxine retard treatment on primary care attended elderly patients with depressive syndrome. We will also study secondarily its effects on anxiety, somatic and painful symptoms of depression.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Venlafaxine Extended Release in Elderly Depressed Patients
